messages: It's finally here. Watch Rihanna's #HalfofMe documentary: Budweiser Presents: Rihanna's 'Half Of Me' (Official Documentary) Every amazing show is one half artist and one half audience. 'Half Of Me' is a story told from two perspectives: The fans, and Rihanna herself. Watch how Rih...

The games are getting bigger, but we're counting on our little guy to call them. See who the #PuppyPredictor has got for #NEDvsARG. Not sure who'll win tomorrow’s #WorldCup match? Never fear, the #PuppyPredictor is here. See who our little guy picks for #BRAvsGER. Puppy Predictor: Brazil vs. Germany Semifinal | Budweiser World Cup 2014 Guess who's back? Watch the puppy's prediction for the Brazil vs. Germany semifinal match.

From “Jungle” to “Lowlife.” Be the first to hear the next big thing. #MADEforMusic X Ambassadors & Jamie N Commons: "Lowlife" Unplugged
“Jungle” is this summer’s big hit single, and Jamie N Commons + Sam Harris of X Ambassadors  found the perfect busker to remix it.

From the London Underground, to the NYC Subways. Jamie N Commons  and Sam Harris of X Ambassadors are at our next stop in search of the ultimate busker band. Check out the sneak peek of Ep. 2: New York. #MADEUnderground #MADEforMusic

Every busker has a dream. We sent out Jamie N Commons and Sam Harris of X Ambassadors to make some of those dreams a reality on the Budweiser #MadeInAmerica stage: http://youtu.be/PlYeIDxFJ2Y #MADEUnderground Timeline Photos
#MADEUnderground kicks off in London. We’re looking for the 1st busker to perform with Jamie N Commons & X Ambassadors at the Budweiser #MADEinAmerica festival. Timeline Photos

The search for an amazing busker to perform their hit single "Jungle" will take Sam Harris and Jamie N Commons to the concrete jungle, New York City.

It all goes down on #MadeUnderground #ComingSoon #MADEforMusic: http://youtu.be/I-FI0Eqx62M Timeline Photos
Sam Harris and Jamie N Commons scoping out local talent in London looking for the next busker to remix their hit "Jungle": http://youtu.be/I-FI0Eqx62M #MadeUnderground #MADEforMusic Timeline Photos

The creators of the smash hit “Jungle”, Sam Harris from X Ambassadors and Jamie N Commons are on a mission to put together the first global group of street performers from around the world.

Check out the FIFA World Cup™ Final Draw with some of the world's biggest fans. 

To see even more Final Draw reactions, check out http://www.RiseAsOne.com/. Budweiser Hosts the FIFA World Cup™ Draw

To celebrate the FIFA World Cup™ Final Draw and the global unifying power of football, we partnered with world-renowned artist, David Garibaldi, to develop a commemorative work of art that was created in real-time during the Final Draw event.

To see all the Final Draw reactions, check out http://www.RiseAsOne.com. Budweiser Presents: Art of the Draw at the 2014 FIFA World Cup™ To celebrate the FIFA World Cup™ final draw and the global unifying power of football, Budweiser partnered with world-renowned artist David Garibaldi to deve...
